term.title: decay curve

item.text: A graph showing the relative amount of radioactive substance remaining after any time interval.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2518 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
